results.content: It was very helpful and almost everything worked. I had to do some tweeks here and there but nothing major. I just was hoping that the making money section was a little bit longer and more in depth.

response.content: Thanks for the review.  If you don't mind, what did you have to tweak?  I can make some updates!  I understand about the making money section - it is more of getting you started and letting you figure out which direction you want to go.

results.content: REALLY like the no fluff approach. Unfortunately, I have a bad habit of tuning out if people talk about what they are going to do for too long. So I would say this course is perfect if you share my habit :) Love the fact that it teaches you how to use Ramnode

results.content:
If you want to make money, this is the course you need. TJ will explain you step by step all you have to do to have a profitable business.

The support is really quick and accurate.
